programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan S1 Ep5236
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing's son attempts drug trafficking to save his father's studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earth's surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men 2
programme.desc: Continuing from Ah Boys to Men, Ken returns to barracks, determined to change because of his bedridden father, and becomes a model recruit. However, his comrades think Ken wants to flatter and show off only, and repel him. Although Ken wants to explain, misunderstanding gets deepen through days. Can they unite and overcome the challenge together?

programme.title: Fight Back to School III
programme.desc: The millionaire, Million Wong , is found dead in a hotel room. Officer Sing Sing (Stephen Chow) is called in when a man is murdered with an ice pick during sexual intercourse. By an uncanny coincidence the man looks identical to Sing so the decision is made to send him in as an undercover again for further investigation. In the same day, he finds himself with a beautiful wife (Anita Mui), an incompetent sidekick (Anthony Wong) and one very unhappy girlfriend (Cheung Man). All this and somehow he still has to try and solve the case!

programme.title: An Abandoned Team
programme.desc: Uncle Jia is bad-tempered and lives alone. His forced retirement, failed marriage and strained relationship with his daughter have left him in despair, prompting him to consider ending his life. Fortunately, he is rescued by a stray dog and an animal welfare volunteer, allowing him to rediscover his purpose in life.

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his father's death

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Life Hotel
programme.desc: Once a gangster, Li struggles to find work to pay for his father's heart surgery. To earn money, he goes undercover to help shut down Life Hotel for a redevelopment project, but gradually forms bonds with its residents. As Li discovers that the hotel serves as a home for the sick, he grapples with his sense of responsibility and empathy.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Former world champion boxer Fai meets fiery young fighter Qi in Macau. As he mentors Qi for an upcoming MMA tournament, Fai rekindles his passion for fighting, life, and the people he cares about.

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools' choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Stuntman
programme.desc: Washed-up stunt director Li Sen is offered the role of action choreographer on his director friend's final film. Bringing along an ambitious young stuntman, the two generations risk everything to stage a comeback. As Li Sen battles his fierce temper and past mistakes, he also strives to mend his relationship with his estranged daughter.

programme.title: Fight Back to School II
programme.desc: Star Chow (Stephen Chow) is an officer in the Royal Hong Kong Police's elite Special Duties Unit (SDU). During a meeting with his senior officer, Inspector Yip (Deanie Ip), Star jokingly suggests he wish to be reassigned to the traffic unit. Star immediately finds himself demoted to Constable engaging in traffic duty on the streets of Hong Kong. After being made the scapegoat for a failed high school terrorist investigation, Star hastily resigns from the police. He decides to enroll at the high school to launch his own private investigation. But Star realises the investigation won't be easy when he discovers that the bumbling, incompetent CID detective Tat (Ng Man Tat) is also undercover at the high school.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin's trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: A low level magistrate is run out of town for defending a beautiful murder suspect. Through a series of comedic events he ascends to the top rank & returns looking for revenge.

programme.title: Wolf Hiding
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer, Chen An vows to take revenge for her sister who was killed by a crime gang. Dealing with the police and the triad at the same time, a final battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Bursting Point
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Bang sends Officer Ming undercover to a drug cartel to displace drug lord Yang. A failed raid triggers Yang's rage for revenge. Meanwhile, drug maker Ying Xiu is forced to cooperate with the police and sets a trap for Yang. The battle between the police and the drug cartel has just begun!

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: An ordinary, cheerful and kind-hearted girl Bao, meets a troubled rich guy Edward by chance one summer. To ruin his father's remarriage plans, Edward hires Bao and her friend to sabotage the wedding and that is how Bao and Edward meet and fall in love. All seems well for the sweet couple until their love quickly takes an unexpected turn

programme.title: Imprisoned 2: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: Hong Kong businessman Yu and his secretary travel abroad for business meetings. When the secretary is killed in their hotel, Yu is arrested. Despite pleading not guilty, Yu is imprisoned in a cruel multinational prison where the warden enjoys torturing prisoners, and he must find a way to escape from this dark and deadly prison to survive.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect's Zhang Chui Shan's son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer of an indie band called Band Four reunites with her estranged guitarist father following the death of her mother. Together with her half-sister and her nine-year-old son, the newly reunited family come together to support each other through their love and passion for music.

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: A drug cartel is entrenched in the Dong Zhou area. Mei Jing of the Thunderbolt Women's Commando Unit, leads her team to attack the drug base, but they are being ambushed and the identity of Mei's father as an undercover is exposed. After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tian's daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family's young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo's stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich man's party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chief's granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a swordsman who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonour. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the government's secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperor's ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat's knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung's house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung's mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend's baby...

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his son's arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called The Venoms, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang's. On the Chang's farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu skill from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in a fight between the Qing and Ming camps along the way, and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chu's family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fianc Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rong's hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister's wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends' help.

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon's pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.desc: Kara And Shiki / Mega Marble Mania Madness / Scramble Scrap Squad - Dressed in a miko's outfit, Nico and Kuku are helping out Kara's father, who is the head priest at a shrine. While helping out, Nico uses the spell Ani-snippy from shide paper, and creates a moving paper cat. Kara also wanted to create a flying bird, but the shape didn't come out too well and couldn't take flight. But the shape she cut out was so terrible that it looks like a shikigami and ended up creating a life?

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Letter From A Friend - Morihito was cleaning his room, and found a letter that Nico wrote to him when they were children. To Moi, I will always be your friend. Morihito had it pinned to the wall for five years and looked at it almost every day and got cheered up by it. It was the death anniversary for Morihito's mother, so he went to visit her grave. Meanwhile, Nico, Kanshi, Keigo, Miharu, and Nemu who was visiting, were listening to a story of Nico and Morihito's childhood days.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep6
programme.desc: First Buddy - Iori and Kohei get through their exams by cheating. Meanwhile, PaB throws a welcome party for Aina, their new member. Aina was looking forward to getting a new start to college life, but discovers that no one in the club is normal! Nevertheless, the club members are serious about diving and have the new members learn basic hand signals and dive in pairs. However, Iori gets paired up with Chisa.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Doubles - Iori and the others dream about going diving at a beautiful location after seeing an article on Miyakojima in a magazine. However, Tokita and Kotobuki decide the club is going to join a tennis doubles match! They explain that they're joining the match to get everyone to build trust with their diving buddy, but the real reason is to get back at the tennis club and take away their prize money!

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Letter From A Friend - Morihito was cleaning his room, and found a letter that Nico wrote to him when they were children. To Moi, I will always be your friend. Morihito had it pinned to the wall for five years and looked at it almost every day and got cheered up by it. It was the death anniversary for Morihito's mother, so he went to visit her grave. Meanwhile, Nico, Kanshi, Keigo, Miharu, and Nemu who was visiting, were listening to a story of Nico and Morihito's childhood days.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Lost Wolf And The Stray Cat - Keigo can't use his immense strength unless he looks at a crescent shape. Nico sees that Keigo is sad, so she asks him to become the user for a ring that has flying magic sealed inside. If he can come to utilize it, he should be able to wield it as a weapon, so Keigo begins his training. One day, in the middle of training, Nemu visits and talks to him.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Doubles - Iori and the others dream about going diving at a beautiful location after seeing an article on Miyakojima in a magazine. However, Tokita and Kotobuki decide the club is going to join a tennis doubles match! They explain that they're joining the match to get everyone to build trust with their diving buddy, but the real reason is to get back at the tennis club and take away their prize money!

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Men's Cocktails - The members of the diving team start working part-time jobs to pay for their trip to Okinawa. However, Iori and Kohei end up spending all their earnings on drinking. Meanwhile, Kotobuki is working hard as a bartender, and his boss lets Iori and Kohei try it out too. However, these two idiots don't know how to make cocktails, and end up creating some dangerous new drinks!

programme.desc: The team fights to save the life of one of their own. Frost and Abrams butt heads with their patient. Dr. Charles and Dr. Reese continue to clash over a patient, dredging up unresolved issues between them.

programme.desc: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) - and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) - to take action.

programme.title: The World's End
programme.desc: In "The World's End", Simon Pegg and Nick Frost reunite for an epic pub crawl that turns into a fight for humanity's future. Director Edgar Wright delivers a hilarious mix of nostalgia, comedy, and sci-fi thrills.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: After chimps infected with a deadly rage virus are freed, a global pandemic nearly wipes out humanity. A small group of survivors, led by Jim (Cillian Murphy), must navigate desolate London and find hope amidst the chaos.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner Tom Wynne and family are killed by the infamous and elusive assassin Rogue (Jet Li), FBI agent Jack Crawford (Jason Statham) becomes obsessed with revenge as his world unravels into a vortex of guilt and betrayal.

programme.title: Anacondas: The Hunt For The Blood Orchid
programme.desc: A team of scientists braves the dangers of the rain forest in search of a flower that contains a youth serum.

programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme battles terrorists at a hockey game to save the Vice President and stop a stadium bombing in this explosive thriller. Can he stall the game long enough? It's Sudden Death!

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: Every district in the nation of Panem must send a boy and girl to fight to the death in the annual Hunger Games competition. Jennifer Lawrence is 16-year-old Katniss Everdeen, who volunteers to take her younger sister's place in the games.

programme.title: 3:10 To Yuma
programme.desc: Dan is a struggling rancher who volunteers to safely deliver Ben Wade, the captured leader of a gang of thieves, to a train station where the 3:10 to Yuma will transport him to trial. Ben's gang of cutthroats and robbers has other plans.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Munich's high-speed Autobahn.

programme.title: The World's End
programme.desc: In "The World's End", Simon Pegg and Nick Frost reunite for an epic pub crawl that turns into a fight for humanity's future. Director Edgar Wright delivers a hilarious mix of nostalgia, comedy, and sci-fi thrills.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Law and Order - In an unruly world our ancient powers must lead their people, create ways to govern and keep rebellion at bay. Who will find the right way to rule?

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Saving Asia - Many passionate people are dedicated to saving the wild animals of Asia. These individuals and their ingenious solutions give us hope and optimism for the future of the continent.

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Salmon - Patrick is in British Columbia to observe the annual salmon run, which plays a crucial role in ensuring the species' survival while also sustaining the entire rainforest ecosystem.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bigness - Griff Rhys Jones starts his Canadian journey in Newfoundland where he goes looking for moose.

programme.title: Big Adventures: Into the Gobi Desert with Nick Knowles S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In the second part of Nick Knowles' remarkable Mongolian adventure Nick heads to The Nadaam Festival, a vibrant celebration of the ancient skills that were once required to become a warrior.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S5 Ep2
programme.desc: Stranded In Hell - Adventurer Cyril Chauquet seeks out the most colossal and dangerous underwater creatures in the world. Stranded on a deserted island off the west coast of Panama, Cyril and his team are in survival mode. Cyril is trying to catch a huge Dienton, a large predator with huge teeth.

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World S1 Ep2

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Shark vs Barracuda - In central Africa, Cyril must remain on high alert, especially from his small tippy dugout. programme.title: Kingdom S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Injured wild dog Flint helps care for Storm's largest ever litter of pups. Leopard Mutima searches for a home, and the lions are challenged by forces beyond their control.

programme.desc: Family Matters - For primates, family is everything. Complex social lives are key to their success.

programme.desc: Series 3, Episode 12 - Comedian Rosie Jones shares her childhood haunts with Robson in North Yorkshire.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep6
programme.desc: Series 5, Episode 6 - In Germany, floods tear through central European towns and villages. In Nepal a landslide threatens local communities. In California, wildfires tear through the states forests and farms.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spiky and Stinky - Check out vet Phil's clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic's favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who's the catch of the day.

programme.title: Chasing The Rains S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Fickle River - Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Chasing The Rains S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta's loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the region's dark side.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Three's a Crowd - Welcome Anna's clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Anna's scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Invasion Begins - When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.desc: Saltwater Crocodile - Navigate a mangrove forest in Borneo with the saltwater crocodile, which is perfectly suited to life among the watery roots. Discover how this reptile uses the environment to regulate its temperature and why its epic patience makes it a super hunter.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Becoming a Bear - Bone up on outdoor skills as Winston and the X girls move into their new fresh-air enclosure, and witness Yasmine and Yara's kindergarten power struggle. Then look over restless yearling Victor, whose sudden limp pushes back his release date.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Victor Goes Wild - Experience the joys of rain and climbing with Yasmine and Yara, and watch Winston take a dip in his new pool. Go hunting for dropped radio collars with Roger and Steve, then see what happens when the two groups of summer cubs come face-to-face.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomad's brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle - Join the team's scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who's having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill's new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Busy Bay - Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Three's a Crowd - Welcome Anna's clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Anna's scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Animal Senses S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Smell - The first sense to evolve in the first animals was chemoreception: being able to detect chemicals in the animal's environment. This helps animals find prey and mates, and to sense predators from a distance.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Orangutan - Investigate the art of nest making with the jungle's master builder: the orangutan. Shadow Max as he tries to escape the insect-filled floor of the Borneo rainforest and takes inspiration from this solitary primate's natural engineering prowess.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions' camouflage. Watch Einstein fail to make new connections and weigh the pros and cons when Keeza and her cub are kidnapped by rival male Mad-Eye Moody.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Family Dynamics - Say hello to a season of plenty as flood waters recede and vast herds of prey return to the Chobe's banks. Watch Keeza and her cub make a break for it while Caller and Tom Tom brawl with their enemies, then cheer when Einstein finally finds a mate.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Punks on the Run - The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK pride's territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Ava's survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

Chetna Makan shows viewers a great and simple dish to batch cook, chicken curry.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Moles - Jack Sprat and Puss journey underground in search of treasure and discovery a kingdom of moles led by a rather bizarre king.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Mermaid - To prove he's a ladies' man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him and becomes his worst nightmare

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep13
programme.desc: One Last Job - The team plans a heist in order to obtain the enchanted pendant that can lead them to the storm wheels. Elsewhere, Klaus and Veruca shipwreck on a mysterious island that is actually home to the mages, and also the Tianshang weapon helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Doom and Groom - Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Daddy Julien - King Julien believes Mort is the son he never knew he had - despite the fact that Mort is two years older than him.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep19
programme.desc: That's Sooo Rob - Julien's former BFF, Rob, returns to lure the king away from his royal responsibilities and back to his crazy partying days.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep20
programme.desc: A Knight's Tail - Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep21
programme.desc: DJ's Glow Ride - Gabby receives a special nighttime delivery, unboxing a glow-in-the-dark train engine. However, she realizes that she's missing the other three train cars to complete the whole train. The Gabby Cats help Gabby build the other three glow-in-the-dark train cars by creating shapes through interactive/musical games. In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, DJ Catnip sings a song.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep72
programme.desc: Floaties - A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep73
programme.desc: Breaking The Bank - Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tina's new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep74
programme.desc: Hate That Baby! - After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits' attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Gorgwatch Project - After Thunk and Guy tell Eep and Dawn a campfire story of Gorgwatch, a hideous monster who roams the woods, the girls are terrified. After a sleepless night, Guy and Thunk assure the girls it's just a made up story. Dawn and Eep are relieved until they find proof that Gorgwatch is real... and he's coming for them.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Skate or Dawn - When Guy invents a primitive skateboard, Eep and Dawn have a blast trying new tricks. But when the punch monkeys want to take over the girl's awesome new skate spot, Dawn and the punch monkeys enter a skate-off to win back the skate canyon once and for all.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Phil's Fun Farm - When Phil learns no one on the farm thinks he's fun, he sets out to prove them all wrong... by building a crazy amusement park.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep24
programme.desc: The Decoy - Tom's leadership abilities come into question by Eugene when his decisions lead to failure while attempting to confront Buzzsaw.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep25
programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 1 - Tom and Thunder discover a baby Nightlight and must bring him back to Thunder's home realm.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 2 - When Thunder's clan of fellow Nightlights is attacked by the Snow Wraith, Tom vows to rescue them.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Thunder Games - When Gran announces it's time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she's got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Shock and Awww - Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Straycation Part I - The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along - they're so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 2 - When Thunder's clan of fellow Nightlights is attacked by the Snow Wraith, Tom vows to rescue them.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Cold Open - Tom and the riders discover the Ice Realm and find Buzzsaw inside.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Uncharted Territory - Alex and Eugene find themselves at odds with Tom and their fellow dragon riders when Feathers and Webmaster go missing during a blizzard in the Ice Realm.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Turn And Burn - Stoick, Hiccup and Snotlout search for Spitelout when he goes missing, and ultimately find him on a distant island battling a fiery Singetail dragon.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Buffalord Soldier - Astrid comes down with the Odin's Revenge flu and the Riders must search for the cure by finding a nearly extinct Buffalord dragon before Viggo does.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Monsters & Mana - Allura and Lance walk in on Shiro, Pidge, Hunk, and Coran playing a magical role-playing board game

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Caverns And Creepers , Rad Teacher - When Eep is kicked out of Thunk's new imaginary role-playing adventure game she decides to play her own, real version of the game, Fed up with Squawk's mean teaching style, Eep has Grug fire him and replace him with Rad, the quintessential young, cool teacher

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Lucky and the Dressage Sabotage - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Aquadons - To escape big trouble, the Dinotrux quickly put together a raft and hit the sea. But there might be danger lurking in the water, too.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jungle Phone - When their jungle phone breaks Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo lose contact and Raa Raa thinks Ooo Ooo doesnt want to be friends any more. Luckily Topsy is able to help them find each other again.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Zippy Zipwire - Zebby is too scared to go down the zipwire and everyone chanting loudly at her makes matters worse. Raa Raa realises the noise is putting her off and if everyone is quiet it might help Zebby.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Noisy Story - Topsy wants to tell her friends her favourite story but they interrupt her making lots of noise. Topsy is upset. Raa Raa realises what has happened and goes to make amends.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jingly Jangly Jungle Band - Raa Raa becomes the singer in Crockys Jingly Jangly Jungle Band but he gets so carried away with his singing that he forgets a promise.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Banana Balloons - Its Banana Day in the Jingly Jangly Jungle and Huffty gives everyone a banana balloon to play with but while Raa Raas friends are playing Banana Day games Raa Raa doesnt seem quite himself.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Crockys Lost Toy - When Raa Raa accidently loses Crockys favourite Toy hes determined to find it again and with a little help from his friends and by using his eyes and ears he does just that

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Game Show - It's Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the butt xylophone couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Kitty Pirates - Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it's time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many lands of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harold's latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Cave New World - When the adults exclude the kids from their adult-only cave, the kids make their own much cooler cave, soon making the adults want to switch caves.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Dragons of the Undead - When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Chinese Nian Year Pt. 1 - It's Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In,To Catch a Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Rainy Day Banana - With a little help from Gabby's imagination, a sparkly toy banana turns into a magical Rainy Day Banana that helps Gabby and the Gabby Cats have fun on a rainy day! They have silly banana snacks with Cakey, make crafts to tell a story with Baby Box, and have an a-meow-zing banana dance party with DJ Catnip. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Cakey sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep23
programme.desc: CatRat The Bandit - The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Stuff , Campout - When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didn't go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Family Trip , Great Great Grandicorn - Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found , In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Longest Yardwork , The Girl Who Cried Goose - Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Treasure Riders - When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Puff Enuf - The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Bees - Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like Piper can control with her magic flute.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Squad - Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep15
programme.desc: The Pinging - Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Mister Mastodon - Po and team arrive in Guatemala and meet farmers who are facing a mysterious threat-- named The Protector, wielding the Storm Wheels. Elsewhere, Colin the Stag Knight and Weimin team up to go after Po and discover Mr. Ping's connection to the widely feared Pirate Queen.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Man In The Iron Booty - King Julien sends his entire kingdom away on rafts to help an alleged fellow king who is supposedly in distress.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Monkey Planet - King Julien declares that lemurs will land on the moon and seeks help from a former astronaut: Stanislav, the Russian Space Monkey.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep75
programme.desc: North of the Border - With his identity as a fugitive businessman exposed, Boss Baby has been hiding out in the lawless land of Canada. But he's forced back into action over a new crisis with Baby Love: several criminals have copycatted Boss's fugitive strategy, somehow turning themselves into babies to hide out from the law. While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep76
programme.desc: Intensive Purposes - After getting caught at the border, Boss, Tim, JJ, and Pip have to organize an escape from a former novelty restaurant turned interrogation facility using only the four phone calls they've been given. Meanwhile, Tina has a plan for Dez to infiltrate the criminal baby organization to break them up from the inside, but it's complicated when Tina's new assistant Temp Baby Aubrey accidentally takes over Dez's undercover baby criminal role.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep77
programme.desc: The Unshakeable Bear - Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canada's most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that she's not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Joy Story - When Eep and Dawn find a stranded egg, they eagerly take it in as their new pet, but when they learn the egg is not what it seems, they have to return it before it becomes dangerous.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Big Shine - When Grug overhears Thunk accidentally call Phil "Dad", he tries to reconnect with Thunk by taking him to the natural spectacle known as "Big Shine."

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Ball in Cup - When Phil invents a simple new game called ball-in-cup, everyone except Hope, can't stop playing it. But just when Hope thinks she's rid the farm of the game, she finds herself addicted to the game worst of all.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep56
programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep57

When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.
