programme.desc: Dressing Up - Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep119
programme.desc: New Shoes - Peppa loses her shoes, but she gets new red ones. Now she is so happy in them, that she refuses to take them off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep120
programme.desc: The School Fete - Peppa and her family go to the school fair, and do lots of stuff while they're there. Peppa and her friends get their faces painted as tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Mummy Pig's Birthday - It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep122
programme.desc: The Tooth Fairy - Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Moving Mission / Barbabright's Invention - During a walk, the Barbapapa family discovers a megalith. Barbabright has a stroke of genius: the invention of the "BAM".

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Princess For A Day / Barbabeau's Adventure - Barbabelle proudly announces to her family that she wants to become a princess. Barbabravo is moping with boredom, his brothers and sisters are all busy and no one wants to play with him.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep313
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Mega Stunt Ramp - Rubble & Crew use their giant trucks to make awesome stunt ramps when Mega Meister challenges Mayor Greatway to a stunt competition.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep311
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Rotating Restaurant - The pups use their mega-sized trucks to help Lucas and Lily give their parents the most awesome anniversary ever.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep617
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bears / Pups Save a Farmerless Farm - Bears are asleep all over town! The PAW Patrol must work quietly to save the bears and return them to their cave. With the farmers out of town, Mayor Goodway calls the PAW Patrol to wrangle the animals.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1010
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flying Farmer Yumi - When Farmer Al builds a windmill, the wind takes Farmer Yumi and Garby on a wild flight.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. The Barbapapa decide to save energy.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Barbabeau's Adventure - Barbabravo is moping with boredom, his brothers and sisters are all busy and no one wants to play with him.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Moon Cow / Nebulator / Space Bug - Tim, Tommy & Tia find a lost toy and vow to return it to its owner. Kai is super excited to ride the Nebulator, but Tim isn't so sure. Tim and Kai try to photograph the illusive SpaceBug.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep313
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Mega Stunt Ramp - Rubble & Crew use their giant trucks to make awesome stunt ramps when Mega Meister challenges Mayor Greatway to a stunt competition.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep311
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Rotating Restaurant - The pups use their mega-sized trucks to help Lucas and Lily give their parents the most awesome anniversary ever.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep304
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Super Mega Movie Screen - A new Super Squirrely Whirly movie is playing at the drive-in theater! But when Speed Meister gets in the way, the pups spring into action to save the day.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Catch The Quickatoo / Lost Lorito - Abuela shows Dora her photo album of birds, with one page blank: the Quickatoo. Dora vows to find the Quickatoo and get a picture to complete the album.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep716
programme.desc: Wild West Heroes - Yeehaw! Blaze, AJ, and Starla are on their way to a Wild West Picnic! But when the Lunchbox Bandit steals everyone's lunchboxes, it's up to our Wild West Heroes to get them back!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence Please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Double Booked / Bogweed / Prizes - Tim tries to be at two parties at once. Tim tries to find a bogweed free snack for Kai. After losing again and again, Tia tries to win every party game.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep313
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Mega Stunt Ramp - Rubble & Crew use their giant trucks to make awesome stunt ramps when Mega Meister challenges Mayor Greatway to a stunt competition.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep311
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Rotating Restaurant - The pups use their mega-sized trucks to help Lucas and Lily give their parents the most awesome anniversary ever.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep406
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake's Cake / Pups Save a Wild Ride - Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip - When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Hiccups - George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Bicycles - Daddy Pig has grown a huge pumpkin and Peppa is riding her bike, but says she wants to ride without training wheels. But soon she crashes into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Secrets - Mummy Pig gives Peppa a box, which has to be kept a secret.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Flying a Kite - Peppa and George go outside to fly their kite, but the kite gets stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Picnic - Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep222
programme.desc: I'm Not A Barbababy Anymore / Roboxman - No! It's over! Barbidur is no longer a baby, he's a big boy now! The barbababies are going to the hypermarket for the first time.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Boots / Moon Parrot / Tailball - Tim tries out some new rocket boots which soon fly out of control. Tim, Tommy and Tia bird-sit the Bronte's MoonParrot. Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Epic Sail - Crusher and Pickle challenge Blaze and his friends to a sailboat race. But when he tries to cheat, Crusher accidentally crashes both ships onto a tropical island!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Pups Save an Ace / Pups Save a Wedding - When stunt pilot Ace runs into engine trouble, It's up to Skye and the PAW Patrol to save her and her plane so the air show can go on!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Pups Save a Talent Show / Pups Save the Corn Roast - It's Adventure Bay Talent Show Day! When the mayor is afraid there won't be enough acts, the super talented Pups can definitely help out!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep113
programme.desc: King - In Teletubbyland, Dipsy is King. Tinky Winky delivers Tubby Custard and Tubby Toast to King Dipsy - whatever King Dipsy wants! Luckily for Tinky Winky they soon swap places.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S6 Ep13
programme.desc: Present - Dee encourages a friend to say 'present', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Zip's Movie - As everyone else gets their films ready for a big movie night, Zip still doesn't know what his film should be about. He wonders whether he will have a film to show at movie night after all.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Muscly Messy - At the OKIDO Oki-lympics, everyone is joining in! A race between Messy with his super muscles and Zam with his amazing new robot pants results in some surprises.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep45
programme.desc: TV Shop - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep44
programme.desc: Wild Girls - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep18
programme.desc: The In Charge Badge - What are the rules about being in charge? Make a plan, keep everyone happy, make decisions, lead by example and listen. Roly takes that one so seriously he gets a bit overwhelmed.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep17
programme.desc: The World Record - The Squirrels want to get a World Record, but in what? And Duggee is too busy to help. "If only we had more Duggee's" muses Tag. Which gives Norrie a record-breaking idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Cool, Man - At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep14
programme.desc: The Colosseum, Italy - Glitch visits Rome to race his Grimbots in the Colosseum. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Daddy Putdown - When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls' evening routine. But with Bluey missing Mum, Dad has to pull out all the games he knows to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hammerbarn - On a trip to Hammerbarn, Bluey and Bingo create their own mini-homes side-by-side in the trolley. But Bluey quickly gets jealous of her neighbour, Bingo.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Andy and the Prairie Dog Pups - Andy, Jen and Scout head to Chihuahua, Northern Mexico to discover how a colony of black tailed prairie dogs protect their pups from prowling bull snakes, hawks and coyotes as the pups take their critical first steps above ground.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Mission: Messy Rug - When Guide dog Kika has a waggy tail-related accident with a purple smoothie, she and her owner Dr Amit visit the Woofton Library of Things to borrow a carpet cleaner.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Tiger and Leaf Insect - Steve and Aneeshwar set up a new toy for a tiger. They then hold an amazing leaf insect and find out how this tiny creature has something in common with the tiger.

programme.title: Playtime Towers S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Pockets - Bella and Lift visit Patch in the Cloud Kitchen. He has found a tiny mouse in his pocket, which reminds him of a tasty treat recipe to make with the Playtimers - pocket mouse pitta!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep15
programme.desc: The Future Badge - The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep14
programme.desc: The Family Photo Badge - The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep13
programme.desc: The Breakfast Badge - Tag's feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast, uh-oh!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Stop Those Superweeds - Some fast-growing plants that don't belong on Academy Island are in danger of taking over. Can the Go Jetters stop the superweed from damaging the Academy and Grim HQ?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep33
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Geo Challenge - The Go Jetters test their knowledge and teamwork in a tricky maze full of trials. But can they escape the labyrinth, beat Glitch's high score and still keep the team together?

programme.desc: Andy and the Prairie Dog Pups - Andy, Jen and Scout head to Chihuahua, Northern Mexico to discover how a colony of black tailed prairie dogs protect their pups from prowling bull snakes, hawks and coyotes as the pups take their critical first steps above ground.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Mission: Messy Rug - When Guide dog Kika has a waggy tail-related accident with a purple smoothie, she and her owner Dr Amit visit the Woofton Library of Things to borrow a carpet cleaner.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Tiger and Leaf Insect - Steve and Aneeshwar set up a new toy for a tiger. They then hold an amazing leaf insect and find out how this tiny creature has something in common with the tiger.

programme.title: Playtime Towers S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Pockets - Bella and Lift visit Patch in the Cloud Kitchen. He has found a tiny mouse in his pocket, which reminds him of a tasty treat recipe to make with the Playtimers - pocket mouse pitta!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep15
programme.desc: The Future Badge - The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep14
programme.desc: The Family Photo Badge - The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep13
programme.desc: The Breakfast Badge - Tag's feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast, uh-oh!
